learning_outcomes.description: Structure and carry out workplace tasks thoughtfully and intelligently.
Develop and express a critical and reflexive perspective on work tasks.

assessments.assessment_title: Identify a problem in the workplace
assessments.task_description:
Identify an opportunity for improvement in the workplace where you are undertaking your internship. It could be a system that could be streamlined, a lack of documentation in some aspect of work flow, or an idea for software or equipment that would make things easier for management or employees. Write up a 500-word proposal:

  • Paragraph 1: a concise statement of opportunity (9 marks)
  • Paragraph 2: your ideas for advancing it (15 marks)
  • Paragraph 3: any resourcing issues applicable to your solution (6 marks)

Feel free to talk through with your internship provider, but please make sure they know this is a hypothetical only. If they want you to implement the solution, they will let you know.

assessments.task_description:
The student will submit a reflective journal of 3,500 words, based on experiences and observations during their internship. The journal may include up to 1500 words of written material, if such written material was composed for the internship provider, for example, media releases, blog posts, editorial reports. If there is a commercial-in-confidence requirement at your workplace, you will need to de-identify these before submission.
